import React from 'react'; import './App.css'; import KeyboardButton from './Components/KeyboardButton'; import Header from './Components/Header'; import Tile from './Components/Tile'; import { createTheme } from '@material-ui/core'; import { ThemeProvider } from '@material-ui/core'; import { grey } from '@material-ui/core/colors'; import { yellow } from '@material-ui/core/colors'; import { green } from '@material-ui/core/colors'; import { red } from '@material-ui/core/colors'; const ButtonThemes = createTheme({ palette: { primary: grey, warning: yellow, success: green, error: red, neutral: { main: '#64748B', contrastText: '#fff', }, } }); const Neutral = createTheme( { palette: { primary: grey[50] } } ); const Wrong = createTheme( { palette: { primary: grey } } ); const Correct = createTheme( { palette: { primary: green } } ); const WrongPos = createTheme( { palette: { primary: yellow } } ); function App() { return (
// OVERARCHING DIV ); } export default App;
